name: The Hot Spring Cavern
description:
When you set out on this adventure, you assumed it would be an easy journey. Just over the mountain, and then you‘ll be back at camp. Now a blizzard‘s struck, and you‘re trapped in this cave with them.

The Hot Spring Cavern is a hack of Breaking the Ice, part of the Romance Trilogy by Emily Care Boss. You will play as two rival travelers caught out in a storm, who happen to find a cave with a convenient hot spring. Will you overcome your differences and forge a connection during your night alone, or will you go your separate ways once the dawn comes?

Requirements

Breaking the Ice is a two player game that is required to use this mod. Breaking the Ice is by Emily Claire Boss and can be purchased separately HERE.
